A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is nothing but changing all of the original intent and story of the first six movies. It is a Progressive hell that finds this an overly manipulated story to play to the Liberal ideals of multiculturalism\, woman power\, and sluts in heat. And the sluts are as much male as female. Very little of it is really new or 'fresh'\, but as expected as you could imagine it to be. \n\nFrom a percentage value\, I'd give it about a 15%\, solely for some newer special effects and quality of the fighting segments. The lady playing Rae\, and the black dude p;laying the 'hero\,' are really very poorly done.
